title: RuntimeError : PyTorch was compiled without NumPy support
body_html:
My pytorch version is 0.4.0a0_bc6243c. and I got stuck in running pytorch program on Jeson tx2. I got
RuntimeError : Pytorch was compiled without Numpy support. How can I solve this problem?
My spec for python and numpy is below

python : 3.6.3
numpy : 1.14.2
cuda : 8.0
body_text:
My pytorch version is 0.4.0a0_bc6243c. and I got stuck in running pytorch program on Jeson tx2. I got

numpy : 1.14.2
cuda : 8.0
body:
My pytorch version is 0.4.0a0_bc6243c. and I got stuck in running pytorch program on Jeson tx2. I got
RuntimeError : Pytorch was compiled without Numpy support. How can I solve this problem?
My spec for python and numpy is below

python : 3.6.3
numpy : 1.14.2
cuda : 8.0
